entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Wawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:59 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 03:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -11.8°C
Pressure: 98.7 kPa
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -15.3°C
Wind: NW 14 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Clearing. Windy. High minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
